name: Jupyter
description: Jupyter is an open-source web application that allows you to create and share documents that contain live code, equations, visualizations and narrative text. Uses include: data cleaning and transformation, numerical simulation, statistical modeling, data visualization, machine learning, and much more.
short_desc: Interactive development environment for data science and machine learning
author: Project Jupyter

form_fields.label: Jupyter Token
form_fields.hint: A secure token for accessing Jupyter. This will be used as your password.

form_fields.label: Jupyter Image
form_fields.hint: Choose the Jupyter image variant that suits your needs

form_fields.label: Enable JupyterLab
form_fields.hint: Choose between classic Jupyter Notebook interface or modern JupyterLab interface
